_sText:
After an torrid love-affair over the "neon" map type, I've had it with Krusty's cheating on me. He's gone behind my glowing back and made realistic maps, maps with "skyboxes" and "suns" and "details" *GASP* OH THE HORROR. 

I'VE HAD IT! WE'RE THROUGH. I'll patch my broken heart with Band-Aids if I have to, you've hurt me for the last time! 

This map includes NO NEON. NONE. WHATSOEVER. It has a custom skybox, how much further from neon can you get?

You might notice that my smooth style still came through a little. Not my fault. I'm just too good. 

YOU CHEATING WHORE, YOU!
